website_summaries.verdict: This ball pit has everything you could ask for, and goes the extra mile in terms of safety. A hands-down winner.
pros: Thoughtfully designed with inflatable safety tube inserts to add stability and prevent bumps
Features a basketball hoop for extra fun and entertainment
cons: Pricey at first glance, but unlike most others, the balls are included

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this! The only thing is that he loves to tip it over...we wedge it between furniture and a wall and this usually helps. 200 balls may seem like a lot but it’s not, it doesn’t really cover the bottom fully. We plan on purchasing probably 200 or 300 more just for depth. The kit included a hand pump (we didn’t use it we used an electric one) and a small patch kit.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Stovall

customer_reviews.title: So glad they are soft
customer_reviews.text: A gift for our Grandson. He loves it - especially the basketball hoop. He also likes to throw the balls at the dog. So glad they are soft :-)
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cote

customer_reviews.title: Likeit
customer_reviews.text: I love the end result.It's spacious which is what I wanted but I had trouble blowing it up and it smells absolutely terrible when first opening it and the amount of balls they give barely covers the floor but I will buy more balls and wash it and the problem should be fixed. It's just that from paying $50 for a ballpit when there are some as cheap as $8 I would expect more and to have to do less
customer_reviews.author: c.27.wade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to any kids room!
customer_reviews.text: All three of our boys love their ball pit! The blow up sides allow our 11 month old to climb in and out safely and practice standing. We did find that it works better on the outside of the ball pit. When it is on the inside it tends to slide up and get the balls stuck between the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Joy K

customer_reviews.title: Ball Tent - Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply and poor quality in the workmanship of the product - A low quality toy of what I would consider junk quality ready for the trash after less than a months use!!
customer_reviews.author: Lew Wagerly

customer_reviews.title: The children had fun crawling around in the ball pit
customer_reviews.text: The children had fun crawling around in the ball pit, chewing on the balls and trying to put the ball in the hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than I expected which is great. The only issue is that it does not have a crawl through door which is great to keep the balls inside but it also means you have to lift the kids in and out to prevent them collapsing the sides. The balls are very bright and colorful, perfect size for little hands but 100 doesn’t even cover the bottom of the ball pit. I have ordered 200 extra balls
customer_reviews.author: Valerie C.

customer_reviews.title: Sides of pit are not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was easy to assemble. I bought this for my 10 month old granddaughter and thought the inflatable padding would make it safer than other ball pits I viewed, however when she pulls up on the side the entire pit collapses. I don’t feel safe letting her play in it. Also the pump that comes with the pit to inflate the padding does NOT work. Over all not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good quality- order additional balls
customer_reviews.text: The ball pit is sturdy, and plenty large enough for 2 kids to play in it. The 100 balls were a nice touch, but nowhere near enough to cover the whole floor of the ball pit. I’d recommend purchasing an additional 200+ balls if you want that true ball pit feel.
customer_reviews.author: Sara s

customer_reviews.title: Giftable
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift. Parents seem happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kylee

customer_reviews.title: Great to have at home
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My 6 months old baby loves it and my 6 years old son loves it more! It’s big enough for the bigger one to play with the baby
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. My 1 year old leans against it and it falls over
customer_reviews.author: Ksoulsby

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves her ball pit! Balls are not heavy and not too soft. Bright, colorful and lots of fun! Like the every other mesh see-thru window/sides, handy to see little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tibrms

customer_reviews.title: Just okay quality
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves playing with it although it’s frayed and shows wear and tear after just a few weeks of use. Decent price but not sure the quality is here.
customer_reviews.author: BeautySavant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my 10 month old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this ! Perfect size for my 10 month old grandson . Great product! I recommended this to anyone !
customer_reviews.author: D Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and the balls crush very easily! But, my son. Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month just knocks it down and gets out within a minute. It's not stable at all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Akar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The price is ok my daughter loved playing with the balls lol
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie moreno

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra money for the inflatable.
customer_reviews.text: The inflatable is not sturdy and constantly falls over my baby. Does not inflate properly. I thought It would protect him and its a nuisance
customer_reviews.author: Fanny Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: ONLY 100 BALLS
customer_reviews.text: Product actually comes with 100 balls, not 200 like the picture indicates. You will definitely have to purchase more balls as 100 does not cover the entire floor of the pit.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Curry

customer_reviews.title: The set up itself is great, however two of the inflatable bumpers came with ...
customer_reviews.text: The set up itself is great, however two of the inflatable bumpers came with holes in them therefor the bumper itself will not stand and is unusable as my child climbs right out. Great idea, poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Corie Cox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Baby boy loves it, it holds up well and the balls stay inside for the most part. The tent has just enough balls.
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA WOODS

customer_reviews.title: Packs away nicely.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our granddaughter. She loves it. It's a lot bigger than expected which is a plus. Her older sisters can play as well. We also bought 200 extra balls to make it real full. I would buy this again. Packs away nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Gasner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for kids but not sturdy at all. More balls should be included.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed it came with the pump. Would recommend to order extra balls
customer_reviews.author: Larry Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete item
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive all of the items that come in this. No balls or inflatable insert. Disappointed. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Blythe

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with 200 balls
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice toy but I did not receive 200 balls. It says on the box that it includes 200 balls and the amount that I was given barely even covers the bottom of the play pen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the in side to it as shown
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved the ball pit easy set up & take down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Would return but got rid of outter
customer_reviews.text: Sides very flimsy. Not enough balls. Hoop just says. Very disappointed. Would return but got rid of outter box
customer_reviews.author: linda tomasello

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 10mo old loved this. It kept him busy for longer than most toys
customer_reviews.author: Melani

product_meta.title: Kids Ball Pit Play Tent with 100 Colorful Crush-Free Pit Balls – Indoor & Outdoor Jumping Fun Playhouse Set Super Safe for Kids and Toddlers
feature_bullets: Kids of All Ages Will Enjoy Non-stop Jumping Fun with Prextex Pop Up Ball Pool Set!

Set Includes: 1 Extra Durable Hexagon Shaped Mesh Tent with Inflatable Tubes. Mini Mesh Basketball Hoop. 100 Crush Free, 2.3 Inch Plastic Pit Balls in a Variety of 6 Cheerful Colors (Pink, Blue, Red, Yellow, Green, Orange). 2 Durable and Reusable Bags- One for Tent and One for Balls. 1 Hand Pump to Blow up Inflatable Tubes.
Tent Dimensions: 47.2”W x 29.1”H, Easily fill it with the Crush Free Balls that can Withstand Over 90 Pounds of Weight!
Balls are Great for Filling any Playhouse, Kiddie Pool, Ball Pit, Tent, Playpen and Bounce House.
Makes a Most Exciting Gift for Any Occasion!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars64 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
